about.first: My name is Murillo, I'm a developer born in Londrina - PR (Brazil). I'm graduated in Computer Science at UniCEUB, I work with development for about 8 years and I love technology.
about.second: Since I was a child I love computer, and in one of my online researchs I found code development, It was a whole new world. So on my own when I was 14 I decided to learn code development, and I ended up discovering that coding was something I enjoyed a lot more than online games.
about.third: I've always been trying to update myself with new technologies and venturing into personal and work projects.
